extendedInfo.description: Simple interactive program to learn Trigonometry.ver 1.7 bugs fixed (fixed the crash & other bugs) & added Pythagorean Theorem.ver 1.8 added Law of Sinesver 1.9 added Distant in a Circlever 1.11 a) added Law of Cosines         b) minor bug fixed.         c) added Positive/Negative sign to Radians & Degreesver 1.12 a) Law of Cosines - wrong label         b) Law of Sines - rework and enhance with degree>90         c) Trigonometry Definition - enhance description for Law of Sines.ver 1.13 a) Relabel for Pythagoream Theorem, Law of Cosines, Distant in a circle & Common Height.         b) Law of Tangents         c) Bugfix         d) New Iconver 1.14 a) Law of Cosines - added samples to find length of side         b) Law of Tangents - enhance with different value         c) Law of Sines - Circum Circle - Relationship of Law of Sines in a Circlever 1.15 a) Inverse Function - convert ratio to degreesver 1.16 a) Mollwide's Formula - verify your calculation         b) Triangle Area         c) Trigonometry Identities - more to come!

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Had to learn trig for a new job.  This was amazingly helpful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its confusing, I do it better with my mind. Nothing extraordinary. Good to ppl struggling with trig though

reviews.comment: thx a lots!!but need a little correction on (+/-)..i\'m agree with marten,dave& true.. that\'s a fatal error!! please fix it for us all.TQ
